includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Agent Phil Coulson heads up a team of S.H.I.E.L.D. special agents to tackle threats too dangerous for the world to even know about. Drama set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Starring Clark Gregg, Ming-Na Wen and Chloe Bennet. Guest appearances from Samuel L. Jackson and Cobie Smulders.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil Coulson leads a team of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents against Earth’s greatest threats. Set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Starring Clark Gregg.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Agent Phil Coulson heads up a team of S.H.I.E.L.D. special agents to tackle threats too dangerous for the world to even know about. Drama set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Starring Clark Gregg, Ming-Na Wen and Chloe Bennet. Guest appearances from Samuel L. Jackson and Cobie Smulders.

includedIn.title: Marvel's Agents Of S.H.I.E.L.D.
includedIn.synopsis: In a world of super-powered heroes, Agent Phil Coulson leads a team of S.H.I.E.L.D. special agents to use espionage to tackle threats too dangerous for the world to even know about.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A revived Agent Phil Coulson heads up a team of S.H.I.E.L.D. special agents to tackle threats too dangerous for the world to even know about.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: In a world of super-powered heroes, Agent Phil Coulson leads a team of S.H.I.E.L.D. special agents to use espionage to tackle threats too dangerous for the world to even know about.
